externalDocs.description: Click here for SDKs in several programming languages

put.summary: Confirm that a message has been received

post.summary: Send a porting request answer delayed
Send a planned activation service number
Send a planned deactivation service number
Send a tariff change service number

data.description: A string containing the data in json format. This data can be any <messageType>Envelope described in this Swagger model.

code.description:
The following error codes are used:
1000 Field validation error
1010 Parameter validation error
1020 Invalid endpoint error
1030 Unsupported media type error
6010 Configuration not found error
6011 Distribution not found error
7030 Jms communication error
7040 Database communication error
7050 Stream termination error
8000 Forbidden error
8010 Unauthorized error
9000 Json to XML conversion error
9999 Unexpected error
